summary: When a video of his mentor's murder surfaces, an investigative journalist takes action to find those responsible.
cast: Sunny Deol|Soha Ali Khan|Om Puri|Aanchal Munjal|Narendra Jha|Ramesh Deo|Tisca Chopra|Harsh Chhaya|Nadira Babbar|Rishabh Arora|Ruhanika Dhawan|Zakir Hussain|Sebastien Vandenberghe|Neha Khan|Sachin Khedekar|Nina Kulkarni|Abhilash Kumar|Lily Patel|Diana Khan|Shivam Patil|Satyajeet|Akshay Singh|Raymon Singh|Anisha Hinduja|Prashannt Jha|Manoj Joshi|Neha Khan|Neena Kulkarni|Suchint Singh|Lokesh Tilakdhari|Ajay Upadhyay|Ajay Upadhyay|Rajeev Vashishth|Reyna Vashishtha
title: Ghayal Once Again
